verses.verse: וְהַנָּחָשׁ֙ <S%H5175><s%> ve-han-na-Chash Now the serpent הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah was עָר֔וּם <S%H6175><s%> 'a-Rum, more subtil מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol any חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat than any beast הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh, of the field אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah had made יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; God וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah, unto the woman אַ֚ף <S%H637><s%> 'af Yea כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, hath God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תֹֽאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu, Ye shall not eat מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> mi-Kol any עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz of every tree הַגָּֽן׃ <S%H1588><s%> hag-GAN. garden

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said הָֽאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah And the woman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַנָּחָ֑שׁ <S%H5175><s%> han-na-Chash; unto the serpent מִפְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> mip-pe-Ri of the fruit עֵֽץ־ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz- of the trees הַגָּ֖ן <S%H1588><s%> hag-Gan of the garden נֹאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> no-Chel. We may eat

וּמִפְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> u-mip-pe-Ri But of the fruit הָעֵץ֮ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz of the tree אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> be-toch- which [is] in the midst הַגָּן֒ <S%H1588><s%> hag-Gan of the garden אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar hath said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תֹֽאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> to-che-Lu Ye shall not eat מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu, at וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or תִגְּע֖וּ <S%H5060><s%> tig-ge-'U of it neither shall ye touch בּ֑וֹ bo; פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- it lest תְּמֻתֽוּן׃ <S%H4191><s%> te-mu-Tun. ye die

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said הַנָּחָ֖שׁ <S%H5175><s%> han-na-Chash And the serpent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָֽאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah; unto the woman לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not מ֖וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot Ye shall not surely תְּמֻתֽוּן׃ <S%H4191><s%> te-mu-Tun. die

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a' doth know אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, For God כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, in בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> be-yOm that in the day אֲכָלְכֶ֣ם <S%H398><s%> 'a-chal-Chem ye eat מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu, at וְנִפְקְח֖וּ <S%H6491><s%> ve-nif-ke-Chu shall be opened עֵֽינֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Chem; thereof then your eyes וִהְיִיתֶם֙ <S%H1961><s%> vih-yi-Tem will be like כֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ke-lo-Him, and ye shall be as gods יֹדְעֵ֖י <S%H3045><s%> yo-de-'Ei knowing ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov good וָרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> va-Ra'. and evil

וַתֵּ֣רֶא <S%H7200><s%> vat-Te-re saw הָֽאִשָּׁ֡ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah And when the woman כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for טוֹב֩ <S%H2896><s%> tOv [was] good הָעֵ֨ץ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz that the tree לְמַאֲכָ֜ל <S%H3978><s%> le-ma-'a-Chal for food וְכִ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi for תַֽאֲוָה־ <S%H8378><s%> ta-'a-vah- [was] pleasant ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu and that it לָעֵינַ֗יִם <S%H5869><s%> la-'ei-Na-yim, to the eyes וְנֶחְמָ֤ד <S%H2530><s%> ve-nech-Mad to be desired הָעֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz and a tree לְהַשְׂכִּ֔יל <S%H7919><s%> le-has-Kil, to make [one] wise וַתִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-Kach she took מִפִּרְי֖וֹ <S%H6529><s%> mip-pir-Yo of the fruit thereof וַתֹּאכַ֑ל <S%H398><s%> vat-to-Chal; and did eat וַתִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> vat-tit-Ten and gave גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also לְאִישָׁ֛הּ <S%H582><s%> le-'i-Shah another עִמָּ֖הּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mah her and he וַיֹּאכַֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> vai-yo-Chal. with her and he did eat

וַתִּפָּקַ֙חְנָה֙ <S%H6491><s%> vat-tip-pa-Kach-nah were opened עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei And the eyes שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem, of them both וַיֵּ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> vai-Ye-de-'U, knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עֵֽירֻמִּ֖ם <S%H5903><s%> 'ei-rum-Mim that they [were] naked הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem; and they וַֽיִּתְפְּרוּ֙ <S%H8609><s%> vai-yit-pe-Ru together עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5929><s%> 'a-Leh leaves תְאֵנָ֔ה <S%H8384><s%> te-'e-Nah, fig וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su and made themselves לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem חֲגֹרֹֽת׃ <S%H2290><s%> cha-go-Rot. aprons

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-me-'U And they heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֨וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God מִתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> mit-hal-Lech walking בַּגָּ֖ן <S%H1588><s%> bag-Gan in the garden לְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> le-Ru-ach in the cool הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom; of the day וַיִּתְחַבֵּ֨א <S%H2244><s%> vai-yit-chab-Be hid themselves הָֽאָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam and Adam וְאִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> ve-'ish-To, and his wife מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from the presence יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch amongst עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz the trees הַגָּֽן׃ <S%H1588><s%> hag-Gan. of the garden

וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- unto הָֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam; unto Adam וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said ל֖וֹ lo אַיֶּֽכָּה׃ <S%H335><s%> 'ai-Yek-kah. Where

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קֹלְךָ֥ <S%H6963><s%> ko-le-Cha thy voice שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti I heard בַּגָּ֑ן <S%H1588><s%> bag-Gan; in the garden וָאִירָ֛א <S%H3372><s%> va-'i-Ra and I was afraid כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because עֵירֹ֥ם <S%H5903><s%> 'ei-Rom [was] naked אָנֹ֖כִי <S%H595><s%> 'a-No-chi because I וָאֵחָבֵֽא׃ <S%H2244><s%> va-'e-cha-Ve. and I hid myself

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said מִ֚י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who הִגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> hig-Gid told לְךָ֔ le-Cha, כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עֵירֹ֖ם <S%H5903><s%> 'ei-Rom naked אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; you הֲמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> ha-min- from הָעֵ֗ץ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz, of the tree אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which צִוִּיתִ֛יךָ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Ti-cha whereof I commanded thee לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti that thou shouldest not אֲכָל־ <S%H398><s%> 'a-chol- eat מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at אָכָֽלְתָּ׃ <S%H398><s%> 'a-Chal-ta. burn up

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said הָֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam; And the man הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah The woman אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom נָתַ֣תָּה <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-tah whom thou gavest עִמָּדִ֔י <S%H5978><s%> 'im-ma-Di, [to be] with me הִ֛וא <S%H1931><s%> hi she נָֽתְנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-nah- gave לִּ֥י li מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָעֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz me of the tree וָאֹכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> va-'o-Chel. and I did eat

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God לָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> la-'ish-Shah unto the woman מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What זֹּ֣את <S%H2063><s%> zot hast עָשִׂ֑ית <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sit; What [is] this [that] thou hast done וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah, And the woman הַנָּחָ֥שׁ <S%H5175><s%> han-na-Chash The serpent הִשִּׁיאַ֖נִי <S%H5377><s%> hish-shi-'A-ni beguiled me וָאֹכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> va-'o-Chel. and I did eat

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer said יְהֹוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֱלֹהִ֥ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַנָּחָשׁ֮ <S%H5175><s%> han-na-Chash unto the serpent כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta hast done זֹּאת֒ <S%H2063><s%> zoT likewise אָר֤וּר <S%H779><s%> 'a-Rur this thou [art] cursed אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah Because thou מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah, above all cattle וּמִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> u-mik-Kol every חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yat and above every beast הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh; of the field עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on גְּחֹנְךָ֣ <S%H1512><s%> ge-cho-ne-Cha upon thy belly תֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lech, will go וְעָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> ve-'a-Far and dust תֹּאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> to-Chal shalt thou eat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei-cha. of thy life

וְאֵיבָ֣ה׀ <S%H342><s%> ve-'ei-Vah enmity אָשִׁ֗ית <S%H7896><s%> 'a-Shit, And I will put בֵּֽינְךָ֙ <S%H996><s%> bei-ne-Cha Between וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein and between הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah, between thee and the woman וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein Between זַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Cha and between thy seed וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein Between זַרְעָ֑הּ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'Ah; and her seed ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He יְשׁוּפְךָ֣ <S%H7779><s%> ye-shu-fe-Cha it shall bruise רֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> Rosh, thy head וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and you תְּשׁוּפֶ֥נּוּ <S%H7779><s%> te-shu-Fen-nu and thou shalt bruise עָקֵֽב׃ <S%H6119><s%> 'a-Kev. his heel ס sa-Mek

אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah Unto the woman אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar, he said הַרְבָּ֤ה <S%H7235><s%> har-Bah I will greatly אַרְבֶּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> 'ar-Beh multiply עִצְּבוֹנֵ֣ךְ <S%H6093><s%> itz-tze-vo-Nech thy sorrow וְהֵֽרֹנֵ֔ךְ <S%H2032><s%> ve-he-ro-Nech, and thy conception בְּעֶ֖צֶב <S%H6089><s%> be-'E-tzev in sorrow תֵּֽלְדִ֣י <S%H3205><s%> te-le-Di thou shalt bring forth בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim; children וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- will be for אִישֵׁךְ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'i-sheCh [shall be] to thy husband תְּשׁ֣וּקָתֵ֔ךְ <S%H8669><s%> te-Shu-ka-Tech, and thy desire וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu and he יִמְשָׁל־ <S%H4910><s%> yim-shol- and he shall rule בָּֽךְ׃ Bach. ס sa-Mek
